Prompt Interface
=============

To use the interactive prompt interface, use one of the two following command :

.../python_automata$ python -i src/prompt2.py
.../python_automata$ python3 -i src/prompt.py


You will be then asked



Once you finish creating automata you can choose the option x the leave the prompt loop and access the python interactive prompt. Your created automata will be in the dictionnary 'saved'



.. automodule:: prompt
   :members:
